com.mygdx.game.controller.entities

Class EntityController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.controller.entities.EntityController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoostController, LavaController, ObstacleController, PlatformController, PlayerController

    public abstract class EntityController
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent the controller of a model
